<h3 id="X36987">X(36987) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTIPEDAL-OF-X(51) TO REFLECTIONS-OF-X(51)-IN-(A,B,C)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^6-(3*b^4+14*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^4+3*(b^2+c^2)^3*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^4)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(36987) = 5*X(3)-2*X(5446) = 7*X(3)-4*X(5462) = 3*X(3)-2*X(5892) = X(4)-4*X(13348) = 5*X(5)-8*X(11592) = 2*X(20)+X(5562) = 5*X(20)+X(12111) = 7*X(20)-X(12279) = 5*X(20)+4*X(15606) = X(20)+2*X(15644) = 5*X(51)-4*X(5446) = 7*X(51)-8*X(5462) = 3*X(51)-4*X(5892) = 5*X(2979)-X(12111) = 7*X(2979)+X(12279) = 5*X(2979)-4*X(15606) = 7*X(5446)-10*X(5462) = 3*X(5446)-5*X(5892) = 6*X(5462)-7*X(5892) = 5*X(5562)-2*X(12111) = 7*X(5562)+2*X(12279) = 5*X(5562)-8*X(15606) = X(5562)-4*X(15644)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(51)</p>
<p>X(36987) lies on these lines:
{3,51}, {4,3819}, {5,11592}, {20,2979}, {22,11202}, {30,3917}, {52,548}, {140,14845}, {154,1092}, {184,35243}, {185,550}, {373,549}, {376,511}, {378,1843}, {381,5650}, {382,5447}, {389,3522}, {394,32063}, {568,15688}, {631,6688}, {1216,1657}, {1294,1303}, {1350,2393}, {1495,12083}, {2386,35704}, {2390,14110}, {2781,3313}, {2888,14864}, {3060,10304}, {3146,11793}, {3292,33532}, {3523,10110}, {3524,5943}, {3526,27355}, {3528,9729}, {3529,5907}, {3534,13340}, {3543,7998}, {3567,17704}, {3579,16980}, {3587,26892}, {3830,10170}, {5059,11444}, {5071,13570}, {5092,15033}, {5640,15692}, {5651,18534}, {5663,15686}, {5946,34200}, {6101,10575}, {6467,10605}, {6636,11430}, {6759,33524}, {7171,26893}, {7502,10564}, {7576,29317}, {7689,21651}, {7999,33703}, {8703,9730}, {8717,18445}, {9306,12082}, {9781,10299}, {9971,31884}, {10219,15709}, {10263,33923}, {10323,13346}, {10627,12162}, {10691,16657}, {10984,11402}, {11001,11459}, {11204,11413}, {11412,17538}, {11454,27365}, {11695,15717}, {11807,13620}, {12038,13564}, {12294,18533}, {13352,22352}, {13363,17504}, {13451,14891}, {13851,14791}, {14130,33542}, {14531,15696}, {14641,18436}, {14810,35921}, {14915,15681}, {15010,35472}, {15038,33544}, {15043,21734}, {15045,19708}, {15305,15683}, {16063,18390}, {16661,34148}, {34566,36749}</p>
<p>
X(36987) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 2979}, {1657, 18435}, {3529, 11455}, {3534, 13340}, {10625, 14855}, {11001, 11459}, {15305, 15683}, {15681, 23039}<br>
X(36987) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 3819), (51, 3), (185, 14855), (2979, 15644), (3060, 16836), (3819, 13348), (3830, 10170), (5562, 2979), (5946, 34200), (9730, 8703), (11381, 18435), (11455, 5907), (13451, 14891), (13598, 6688), (14855, 550), (15030, 3917), (16194, 15067), (16226, 10304), (16657, 10691), (18435, 1216), (21969, 9730), (32062, 5891)<br>
X(36987) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (20, 15644, 5562), (550, 10625, 185), (1216, 1657, 11381), (3060, 10304, 16836), (3060, 16836, 16226), (3567, 21735, 17704), (3917, 32062, 5891), (5059, 11444, 13474), (5891, 32062, 15030), (6101, 12103, 10575), (10627, 15704, 12162), (12111, 15606, 5562), (13570, 15082, 5071), (15683, 33884, 15305)<br>
</p>
